'''''rhain''''' (alternative form '''''rhein''''') is a [[Noldorin]] word meaning "free, [?uncontrolling]".<ref name=Corr>{{VT|46a}}, p. 10</ref>

==Etymology==

The word is a descendant form of [[Primitive Quendian]] ''(a)raniā'',<ref group=note>The "i" in ''(a)raniā'' has an [[Wikipedia:Inverted breve|inverted breve below]]:  ̯.</ref> deriving from [[Sundocarme|root]] [[RAN#Other versions|RAN]].<ref name=Corr/>

==Cognates==

*[[Quenya]]: ''[[(a)ranya]]''
